wikipedia_page.main: Cyrus Mahboubian (1986, London, UK) is a British artist and photographer. He is based in London.

response: Alpines wrote and produced all the tracks on their album Oasis with contributions from MNEK on "Blind" and "Sunset" and Vince Kidd on "Zero". The album artwork photos taken by Cyrus Mahboubian were on display at the opening of the De Re Art Gallery Hollywood from 16 May 2014 with the album sound tracking the exhibition of modern art through the summer. In 2014, Alpines toured the UK to promote the album.
